title: Attendance Using Another Method of Attendance

pages.name: Attendance Using Another Method of Attendance
pages.description: You can ask for an order that allows you, your lawyer, or both of you to attend a court appearance using a different method of attendance, including in-person, by telephone, video, or other electronic means, other than what is scheduled.

elements.name: attendessList
elements.title: Who needs to attend the court appearance using another method of attendance?

elements.name: appearanceType
elements.title: What type of court appearance is it?

elements.name: FAQLegalAdvice
elements.title: How do I know what type of court appearance is scheduled?
elements.body:
You should have received notice of the court appearance either as a court date on an application filed with the court or as a separate document.

If it is a court date on an application, you can select hearing or other and specify “court appearance”. If it is your first appearance on the application, it will be up to the judge to decide if there is time to have a hearing on the first appearance or if a hearing will need to be scheduled. You can still choose hearing.

If you received a separate notice document, it should say “Notice of” and give you the type of appearance. Select that option from the list or use other to specify the type of appearance if it isn’t listed.

elements.name: appearanceSchedule
elements.title: What date and time is the appearance scheduled for?
elements.description: This information can be found on the filed application or the notice from the court.

elements.name: attendanceMethod
elements.description: For example, in-person, telephone, video, or MS Teams. Use whatever wording is on the application or notice from the court. There may be more than one method of attendance. If there is, add each one in the field below. Separate them with a comma.
elements.title: What method of attendance is the court appearance scheduled for?

elements.name: attendanceType
elements.title: How do you want to attend the court appearance?
elements.description:
The court can arrange an appearance in person, by telephone or video using MS Teams. If you want to attend by another electronic method, including a different video conference platform, please indicate your preference below. Your order or additional documents will include instructions for receiving or making the telephone call or attending by video if the court approves your order.

Note: The court may not be able to accommodate a request for a different video conference platform. You may want to contact the court registry to check before making this application.

Select only one option.
elements.otherText: By other means of electronic communication (specify):

choices.text: By video conference using MS Teams

elements.name: submittedDocuments
elements.description: The court wants to know if you have given whatever documents you may plan to use or reference during the court appearance to the other party. If you are asking to attend the court appearance using any method other than in person, you should also make sure the court has a copy of those same documents.
elements.title: Have any documents you may want to refer to in court been submitted to the court registry and received by the other party?

elements.name: attendanceTypeReason
elements.description: Explain why you and/or your lawyer need to attend the court appearance by another method of attendance. You do not need to use any special wording. The key is to be clear about why you want the court to give permission to attend using another method of attendance.
elements.title: Why do you, or your lawyer, need to attend the court appearance by another method of attendance?
